welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bisee, Saint Lucia! Get ready to be captivated by the charm of our beautiful city, known for its stunning natural landscapes and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bisee has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at George F L Charles Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at George F L Charles Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hewanorra Airport handles all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Hewanorra Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be subject to connectivity issues.
